item.title: Jenkins CI
item.description: Jenkins- Continuous Integration Server Jenkins is our open source Continuous Integration tool used for BUILD and Release Jobs. It is an open source product with customisabel plugins which enables it to integrate it with multiple SCMs and run various types of build jobs. Each check in is verified with an automated build allowing early detection of problems. It has the ability to send the status of build and release jobs over an email or in HipChat rooms.
